You should enjoy conversations with those you care about

This is part of §Do I want to stay with Mieke.

I’m not sure this holds as stated. But you should probably enjoy at least some conversations with them. It’s unfortunately quite rare that I do t with Mieke - most of them are either her needing my help (Eg. career), us solving a common problem, gossip or fooling around. Rarely are they interesting.
